data.title: The Real Story After: Cell Vs The Z
data.meta_description: Read Chapter 3-Majin Buu and Frieza too?! from the story The Real Story After: Cell Vs The Z-Fighters by mj_uchiha (Mj Uchiha) with 114 reads. kingkai, bubbles...
data.text:
Well the chapters name tells was this chapter will be about. Hope you guys like this chapter. Oh the fusion lasts an hour in this part of the story. This only happens in my story and not in the real anime.

*****************************************

Cell was powering up and yelling Gogeta decides to move to another planet that was abandoned. He saw a planet called Planet Vegetables. In the planet Vegetables only weird plants lived there, by the way the planet was light green. While Gogeta was sensing two others Ki that appeared out of now were. After the flare that Cell had called two more persons appeared one Gogeta knew It was Frieza and the other person was a pink fat alien with a little horn on his head.

************************************I didn't know what to call it so I called it horn:-P Well on with the story.

************************************

Well we're was I.... O yeah, the pink fat alien intruded himself to Gogeta. "hi my name is Majin Buu and I'm going to destroy you" said Majin Buu angrily. "Hey he is a super saiyan! It can't be I killed Vegeta back at Namek, it can be him or is it Goku it might be him but the planet exploded along with him and myself. But it could've been his son the little brat. But what if Goku was wished by the dragon balls!" murmured Frieza to himself. "Hey super saiyan who are you?" asked Frieza with a confused look in his face. "My name is Gogeta and I'm fused with Goku and Vegeta and I came to exterminate you and your friends!" said Gogeta." It can't be I was sure that I killed Vegeta and Goku died with me in Namek!". "Vegeta was only injured and Dende healed him and Goku was saved by your ship."

" So you Saiyans survived" said Frieza angrily . Wait you guys already meet" asked Cell with a confused look in his face. " Well this two saiyans fought with me in Planet Namek but I was sure that I killed Vegeta with a blast and I frighted with Goku. He exploited along with me when the planet exploited!! But I survived the explosion and so did Goku!!" "I'm not surprised" said Frieza. Cell looked to Majin Buu and saw him running after a butterfly. " Hey Majin Buu you should not be playing with an insect!" while throwing a blast at the butterfly. While Majin Buu starts getting really mad at Cell and starts fighting him. Buu starts kicking Cell in the face but Cell dodges the kick "hey you should save your energy on Gogeta a instead of me" and blasted Majin Buu in the stomach which sends Buu fling into a mountain. "I'll get you when we're done with this one" threatened Majin Buu while getting up. "Don't worry you won't do anything to me because I'm in my perfect form and nobody can defeat me" said Cell very assured. "We will see" said Majin Buu getting closer to Gogeta. "Hey we should start fighting because I'm getting kinda bored over here and I'm losing my temper" said Gogeta not on guard.

Meanwhile at King Kai's place..... "Gogeta you should keep your guard up" warned King Kai. Thanks for the advice King Kai".

Back at Planet Vegetables..... But the warning was to late and Majin Buu had Gogeta locked with his arms and legs not letting Gogeta breath.

Gogeta's prov.... "I should've kept my guard, but I was so busy having fun watching them fight among themselves" said Gogeta having trouble to be able to breath. " I can't let him win or the Earth will be in great danger in their hands, but if I keep on moving around like this this monster will absorb my energy". Could sense somebodies Ki signature but I don't recognize it can it be Piccolo or Pikkon heading this way. I see Frieza Flying toward me and Majin Buu and I also see that he is laughing at someone. "Muhahahahaha!! I can see that you can't move. This is a good opportunity for me to kill you and to use my famous Death Ball!! Witch killed about all of the Saiyan race."I saw an energy ball forming in Frieza's index finger it was red and blackish color! I started to bit on Majin Buu's arm witch was not a good idea because he tasted like rotten eggs but it was worth it. As soon that I was free I turned Super Saiyan. I started to yell to turn Super Saiyan but Majin Buu absorbed most of my energy.

"Did Majin Buu absorbed your energy Gogeta" told me. " No I have a Senzu bean I can get my power back and fight with one of you guys." While getting the Senzu bean out of a pocket and eat it. "Hey do you need help" said a strange voice.
